fields.description: The identifier for the client application obtained when registering the application with the identity provider. Required.
fields.name: ClientId

fields.description: The client secret for the application that is obtained when the application is registered with the identity provider. This is write-only. A read operation returns . Required.
fields.name: ClientSecret

fields.description: For a B2B scenario, possible values: Google, Facebook. For a B2C scenario, possible values: Microsoft, Google, Amazon, LinkedIn, Facebook, GitHub, Twitter, Weibo, QQ, WeChat. Required.
fields.name: IdentityProviderType
